19#include "opt_ah.h"
20
21#include "ah.h"
22#include "ah_internal.h"
23#include "ah_devid.h"
24#ifdef AH_DEBUG
25#include "ah_desc.h" /* NB: for HAL_PHYERR* */
26#endif
27
28#include "ar5212/ar5212.h"
29#include "ar5212/ar5212reg.h"
30#include "ar5212/ar5212phy.h"
31
32/*
33 * Read 16 bits of data from offset into *data
34 */
35HAL_BOOL
36ar5212EepromRead(struct ath_hal *ah, u_int off, uint16_t *data)
37{
38 OS_REG_WRITE(ah, AR_EEPROM_ADDR, off);
39 OS_REG_WRITE(ah, AR_EEPROM_CMD, AR_EEPROM_CMD_READ);
40
41 if (!ath_hal_wait(ah, AR_EEPROM_STS,
42 AR_EEPROM_STS_READ_COMPLETE | AR_EEPROM_STS_READ_ERROR,
43 AR_EEPROM_STS_READ_COMPLETE)) {
44 HALDEBUG(ah, HAL_DEBUG_ANY, "%s: read failed for entry 0x%x\n",
45 __func__, off);
46 return AH_FALSE;
47 }
48 *data = OS_REG_READ(ah, AR_EEPROM_DATA) & 0xffff;
49 return AH_TRUE;
50}
